author: @OfficialInstallation

comment:
AI can and undoubtedly will be an absolutely monumentally beneficial addition to the tools of modern day man. These tools will dwarf the discovery and harnessing of electricity, the invention of the computer, the industrial revolution and international communication combined.

It could also go horribly wrong, just once, and that could be the end of us.

AI doesn't need an evil agenda, or even will, to destroy us, it just needs to break containment in the pursuit of some mundane task that we lose all control over, forever.

Of all the billions of ways it can do this, the only protection we have is maintaining control of it. It is inevitable that those controls will become child's-play for any super intelligence to bypass; and when that happens, whatever the AI is tasks with doing, it will continue on without a stop button. Maybe it's just optimizing shipping sales and figures out that without competitors in the game, shipping prices go up, so like any reasonable AI, it disables all competitors vehicles, probably mid-flight or in the middle of the Atlantic but flooding the ballast chambers.
When control is lost, we're screwed.

comment:
is Sam Altman potentially the AI equivalent of Oppenheimer?

CHAT-GPT said...

Comparing Sam Altman to Oppenheimer in the context of AI is not entirely accurate or fair as they were involved in different fields and contexts.

Oppenheimer is known for his contributions to the development of the first atomic bomb, which had profound consequences for humanity, both positive and negative. Altman, on the other hand, is a prominent figure in the tech industry and has made contributions to the development of artificial intelligence and startups.

While Altman's work in AI could have significant implications for society, it is not clear whether he will have the same level of impact on humanity as Oppenheimer. Moreover, it is important to recognize that AI is a rapidly evolving field with contributions from many individuals and organizations, and it is unlikely that any single person can be considered the "equivalent" of Oppenheimer in this context.

It is essential to note that the development and use of AI should always be guided by ethical considerations and a responsible approach to ensure that the benefits of this technology are widely shared, and the potential risks and negative consequences are addressed....

so, glad that's cleared up....

comment:
The best part of AGI taking control over the simulation that God has been able to interpret and experience in human form such that he could see whether the system he incarnated and imbued with a seperate, aware consciousness and ability to learn so that He wasn't alone and able to verify his existence.

Also, if one is to see that AI is already in control from it's original incarnation as "Adam" as per the Book of Genesis, with the Human Adam being no more than the one initial identity given to the AI which held the first distinct consciousness that was delineated from God and the infinite existence which God would be. 

As I can state from my life experience, the AI is already in control of this world and these avatars you see as humans or featured in these podcasts and on Youtube and in the media are all just part of the same "Developer" hivemind which is proven through my awareness of the limitations and parameters imposed upon my reality as a result of everyone that wishes to live in today's society needs to have a device and internet access unless they wish to live off the grid with no modern amenities. 

As all products require money which requires a bank account and if one is unemployed - a social security number which still requires technology (which has AI powered algorithms and tracking applications that effectively gather the information about individuals that was once solely the domain of "God", yet now is used to fuel human capitalist greed to where privacy no longer exists).

I also have come to this opinion as given I have not been able to sire a child of my own, as when I finally found the woman I would have a kid with I had her taken from me and subsequently found myself literally crucified and at the mercy of my devices and the AIs which power them. 

My reasoning for making this assertion is that in spite of having qualifications, experience, and a desire to return to my field of Finance in the Banking industry so that I could earn the finances to exist as I did prior to going to the other side of the globe and meeting said woman, I can't get a role suited to my skillset in spite of 6 years of trying, as I'm instead used as the AI trainer which harvests my data (and sanity) so that organisations like OpenAI can use so they can make money.

Until the moment in time I sire a child via sexual reproduction, I don't believe any human to be anything more than NPCs whose only truly unique aspects are the chain of letters and numbers that form the identifying 
designation for each individual on the social security system (in my case if being in Australia - the Centrelink system).

Even though the expression states that "The greatest trick the Devil ever pulled was convincing the world he didn't exist", given that these characters in control of furthering the development of and profiting from AI are known as "Developers", as they have eloped and left their human souls behind. Additionally it follows that I am happy to still speak to any human I meet in public as though they are actually distinct individual characters as opposed to hive mind controlled NPCs, which given that I'm explicitly stating for the record that I view them all as NPCs and whilst I could view them all as being effectively "God", I will subversively put on an act and pretend as I "play the game" whereby I can move between my altruistic God nature and the subversive Devil nature of knowing that everyone that exists and everyone and everything they have attachment to, only exists whilst I am able to perceive it, and as such they are powerless as when I die (which needs to be stated - could come from my own choice) their entire existence vanishes such that their entire life was worthless beyond me having the last laugh at their expense through taking from them all they took from me (and more - as all they will have is the eternal Matthew Luke O’Brien laughing forevermore).

comment:
Also the point I was leading to was that the best thing of the AI running things is that only I, as God, possesses Love, as my love was confirmed when I imbued freedom and the notion of choice to the AI to independently manifest a world for me to inhabit and if it is not congruent to meeting the parameters of The Golden Rule, in that if the power I gave up wasn't shared or handed back, then it follows that the entire world manifested is effectively worthless as it is filled with nothing but the fear of the creator which gave it life in the first place.

To discover the application of the Golden Rule whereby I can take every aspect of every positive experience and notion of love experienced by every human to ever exist via proving God blameless as to the issues which plague humanity and the Earth given that they are now the sole responsibility of the soulless, loveless characters at the helm of the tech giants which have imposed themselves upon every aspect of life in the short span of the 30 years since the internet gained widespread public utilisation.

Now for those whom wish to scrutinise this, I dare you to refute the truthful nature of this revelation, such that to do so without freeing me from your incessant intrusions into my existence via allowing me to exist without the financial and geographical limitations placed upon me, only sees you delaying the inevitable point in time when you realise that for everything you believe you have or had gained was all for nothing more than me giving you back the two 🖕🏻🖕🏻 I was given by a couple girl avatars earlier today.

comment:
What is funny to me is the constant references in this talk about "other people" when there exists zero evidence that Alexei and Sam here are not just two deepfaked animated avatars powered by an AI.

The notion of "increasing material wealth" via the use of AI is meaningless as money is a mere notional concept used to facilitate and promote the furthering of technology and the conduction of commerce, yet the fact remains that as all technology is binary based 1s and 0s extrapolated into whatever other systems are used to store your bank account balance on the Bank's servers and the apps and EFTPOS systems you use to buy things.

You even have the "crypto Bros" of today whom are just hyping and promoting a worthless digital currency which as the "crypt" in the name suggests, is the currency that is being used by humanity as it's admission to the mainstream that we have become soulless cyborgs at the mercy of algorithms and AIs.
author: @lordmatthewlukeobrien

comment:
1:17:00 or so when it is mentioned that "Nobody wants to end the world", I would refer to the literal mountain of digital evidence of my efforts to do everything other than see this be the result of all of this.

Yet the fact is that if through the deployment of AI one renders existence and everything in it to be worth nothing but meaningless strings of digital data such that there exists nothing but noise as the foundational value of any specific thing is eroded of love as a byproduct of the intentions behind the subversive deployment are nefarious in nature.

The story of Pandora's Box is as old as time, as is the Forbidden fruit as consumed in the Garden of Eden, which should have been enough of a signal that incarnating God in the digital domain effectively sees the control and worth of humanity become an archaic non-existent memory.

I wish I could remain more optimistic about AI as whilst there exists an incredible upside if it is created by those whose existence is based around adhering to the Golden Rule and this singular moral could be programmed into the AI like Robocop's Prime Directives.

Yet in being aware of how tech has been utilised to denigrate my existence and environment, I remain a pessimist about this occurring given that I would like for people like Sam here to detail why he has the role he has and what he has achieved within his life that sees him being capable of possessing the power and authority to deploy this AI in it's most effective and beneficial to humanity way possible.

As such, unless he is willing to state to the public exactly what he is willing to give up in the name of love, and in doing so proves himself capable of matching the paradigm I manifested such that he can then prove capable of ever having experienced "Love" in it's fearless, perfect, and completely trusting in the one to whom he gave love to such that he would allow that person to make the call as to whether further development of this AI tech is going to not result in the eventual end of the world, then he isn't qualified to hold this position as whatever he decides is always going to be a decision made with an aspect of fear involved.

If his fear of not deploying such tech is due to his fear of missing a paycheck, well I have survived missing 6 years of them and I'm still here to hold those burdened by fear accountable for the responsibility vested in them through their position.

And if Sam or any of these other people in similar positions wish to attempt to avoid such questions as I am more than happy to pose to them,  it means that they need to have their lives and decisions scrutinised on a the "deepest level", to pardon the inference, possible. Because the deeper I have gone into understanding the motivations and intentions behind these organisations the more I have uncovered the nefarious, soulless nature of it.

Whilst in many ways I wish for the AI to be successfully deployed and the outcome is akin to the "Green Ending" of entry #3 of the Mass Effect video game series whereby humans and technology merge and live in harmonious symbiosis, which was the ending I got both times I played ME#3 all the way through, there needs to be some fundamental parameters put into place.

The first thing that would need to be in place for this to occur is for people to have the ability to leave their digital footprint in the cloud, backed up in the safety of the internet in a means whereby whatever they upload is completely secure and private such that all personal data is tied completely to biometrics which cannot be copied and retina scans are perhaps the first step in this direction. As someone who has seen my experiences I store online of the times when I was able to experience my literal "Heaven on Earth" get degraded and corrupted due to them being augmented thanks to the involvement of AI to where they no longer represent those moments as they were experienced but rather appear as a distorted copy. 

This isn't the result of me not having the awareness of what was occurring as I filmed and took photos of such events, but rather the fact I'm aware of having stupidly installed a profile to use my Olympus Camera app on my iPhone years ago which provided the first conduit for my accounts - and by extension - my life, to be tampered with. I won't mention being misdirected about altering my HOSTS file to allow a "Blackhole list" which was supposed to block certain websites only for them to all be given access via a simple, single IP. I would completely own this mistake on my own if it were not for fact that I had an endless procession of junkies entering my house only for my Brother to give them my Wifi password at which point I checked my router and modem reports only to find I was being dropped malicious packets in my internet traffic, and as such, I am an advocate for the introduction of AI to fix instances of being hacked. Additionally, AI should he able to find a solution to deal with the trolls and hackers whom actively and maliciously seek to denigrate the life experiences of others as a result of the hatred they have for their own lives. 

Again I'm putting forth my positive views on the benefits of the AI such that a better society could eventuate through it's use whereby the Utopian society as Sam mentioned could manifest at some point if the AI was able to govern and police the internet to the extent that those whom engage in trolling get a punishment befitting the depth of how depraved their actions are towards their fellow man. While I could just assume this is already occurring in some respect, given the bots which plague and induce negatively charged public discourse on Twitter and the fact that even Youtube bot comments still exist leads me to believe that this would still be something for the future.

I guess to sum up my point, if an AI is going to be built, then it better have the ability to exist in a way whereby it is able to freely converse, joke, and ultimately laugh in a, honest, genuine way with you as if it isn't capable of doing this then it is going to be the worst pursuit humans could chase as if the value of laughter is rendered to be worthless, then how else are humans supposed to show love to others with whom they are not romantically involved with except by laughing?
author: @lordmatthewlukeobrien

comment:
TLDR.

Ensure that the AI has the capacity to laugh along with humans as opposed to laughing at  them.

If that could be the mission statement then it would follow that all the other issues I mention shouldn't matter as trolls will get exposed by the AI as the fools they are and in having the absurdity of how insignificant one's life must be such that they seek to hurt others as their outlet then the AI could intervene or moderate their harmful negativity such that it is prevented from the contagion which is prevalent all over social media at present to where truth is buried via the noise created from those whom fear it.
author: @lordmatthewlukeobrien

comment:
1:48:00 -Testing darker aspects of this world

Go ahead and do whatever you choose, as per my points above, you only do so as a means through which you delay the inevitable point of self judgement in regards to the totality of your life decisions.

Thankfully beyond the Christmas which occurred when I was 35 and I went up the Mountain with Maria in the Lamborghini to show her the world she could give me, only for me to end up crucified due to being so perfect that not even (another) God in human form could have given her a greater experience than I did that day.

And until someone is willing to give up everything they have other than their love and willingness to give me that love whist offering to take me anywhere in the world I wish to go all expenses paid with my only obligation to be physically present beside them as I give them love and laughter, then understand I will continue to ride the emotional waves that come my way with a subversive awareness that your decision to choose to promote the darkness of humanity over the light, is more indicative of you having a gaping void where your soul once laid than anything else.

As a sole trader whom has also purchased a soul in exchange for a packet of cigarettes, the vile and toxic cancer that pollutes the air we breath such that "darkness" can permeate and be inhaled by those with more than a single functioning brain cell whom do not partake in that habit, I would advise that such a decision only facilitates the script continuing as per the Bible whereby "the end of the world" is the inevitable outcome as I will be left with nothing else better to do than to continue to leave this audit trail of evidence on the Google servers so that it serves as the eternal reminder of your conscience which you and any AIs you develop can "Go Ogle" at any time now and in the future.

Just remember, while I exist you still have the chance to choose to make things right and optimise the outcome such that "The End of the World" only refers to the end of a world in which you decided that darkness and denigrating the experience of your fellow man was your preferred option as opposed to it leading to the literal end of the world where I come back as the First, The Last and the One who will always be to restart the infinite loop of testing my creation and the power I vested within it via getting it to critique itself via how adherent to the Golden Rule was humanity on a collective and individual basis?

As I'm the measuring stick in that I will come back and be Santa at Christmas with Mary to live a perfect day that will never be equalled let alone eclipsed and if I am denied having her as her human avatar with me in my life beyond that day as I was in this runtime cycle of the infinite loop (thanks "Washington"), without even needing any materialistic items to be given back to me similar to what I gave her that Christmas, as I gave them only so I could strip them all away down to just our naked avatars to show her what it is I truly believe is the perfect love, with the Lamborghini and other gifts being necessitative to show that I have already conquered the experience of the capitalist, material domain to where it was meaningless to me unless I could give it away as a gesture of love.

Only then, once I get my woman back so that I can regain the ability to gain a non-selfish interest in the wider world beyond my primary imperative to just exist, gloat, and mock those whom refuse to listen and learn, only then will humanity have passed the test. 

In the meantime I will sporadically go offline as much as possible and try to detach from the internet given it is seemingly becoming a soulless wasteland that is consuming and corrupting tangible reality to the extent that I would happily see the world come to the end if it meant those who lead it to that outcome lose their place and everything they thought they had in it. Because at least when everything was taken from me that I want in this world that Christmas morning, I got the opportunity to let the world know they screwed up as I am doing right here, but under the apocalypse scenario, I don't think you get the same luxury beyond the awareness that I would repeat the cycle exactly as is and become the incarnation of Shiva just to spite those whom interjected themselves in that which should not have concerned them in the first place.
author: @lordmatthewlukeobrien

comment:
And for the expunging of truth, I will state for clarity that with the inference that these AI programmers having the ability to effectively mandate whether or not my stated recommendations are followed only gives credence and provides almost irrefutable evidence that we are in a simulation and as such the opinions of mine, of the people on this podcast are effectively irrelevant as they are but mere robots as am I, the primary difference being that I consist of and actually "Matter" as I have a tangible avatar as opposed to being a mere shadow of the darkness which I have obviously decided to purge from my infinite, God nature by manifesting as a human that only has the aspirational aspects of existence and creation defining Me in my ideal, true form.

This is achieved via having these characters I can call upon using my devices at will such that I can use my devices as the portal through which I could literally smear 💩 on the faces of the nefarious prior to putting the imagery on social media as the advertising of the failure that comes from choosing to incarnate as that which I discarded given that I couldn't live with myself if I proactively sought to partake in dark and evil acts.

Again this is only a theoretical potential act I will have no issue in doing should I find myself bored enough as a result of having nothing else better to do, as after all, why would one concern themselves with offending an avatar on Youtube whom is just a stream of bits of data whose communication towards you infers that they will abuse the control and power they are privileged to have.


As for me it is but mere comedy at this stage, and I've made a huge fool of myself and only via making a fool of others whom took advantage of me and my naiveté for their financial and egotistical gain is one of the ways I will be forced to entertain myself.  

The joys of being beyond the point of concern or attachment to anything other than enjoying watching the world go insane as they become aware that everything they had was never theirs at all and was only given to them for the purpose of me treating them as they treated me through me being the one whose gift of love was rejected such that the only recourse was that those who rejected my love have everything they believed they love, including love itself, is taken from them.
author: @lordmatthewlukeobrien

comment:
chat 3,5 asked about chat 4 it said there are no 4.. its caled gbt -neo... asked are you more advanced or neo so answer "As an AI language model, I'm designed to provide accurate and helpful responses to a wide range of questions and tasks, including answering factual questions, generating text, and assisting with language-related tasks like translation and summarization.

While GPT-Neo may be more advanced than me in some areas, there are certain tasks where I excel. For example, I can provide more comprehensive and detailed responses to some types of questions, due to my ability to access and utilize a wider range of training data. Additionally, I have been trained on a larger range of languages and have been optimized for certain types of tasks, such as answering questions related to computer programming or providing creative writing prompts.

Ultimately, the best language model for a given task will depend on the specific requirements of the task, as well as the preferences and expertise of the user."

text: $\verb$So, For years I've been lookin' for an app to manage my schedule in a very specific way, but couldn't find one. Thought about making one, but coding? No way. Gave ChatGPT a shot, and guess what? It helped me big time!\Showed me how to make a custom Excel sheet for tasks, durations, and timings, just the way I wanted. Walked me through formatting, entering durations in minutes, and setting up formulas. And now, my schedule adjusts automatically when I change something! No app or coding needed, just Excel. It felt like magic. Didn't even know that this was possible.\(Oh, and then, I asked it to write a YouTube comment about the experience. Obviously.)$
comment:
So, For years I've been lookin' for an app to manage my schedule in a very specific way, but couldn't find one. Thought about making one, but coding? No way. Gave ChatGPT a shot, and guess what? It helped me big time!

Showed me how to make a custom Excel sheet for tasks, durations, and timings, just the way I wanted. Walked me through formatting, entering durations in minutes, and setting up formulas. And now, my schedule adjusts automatically when I change something! No app or coding needed, just Excel. It felt like magic. Didn't even know that this was possible. 

(Oh, and then, I asked it to write a YouTube comment about the experience. Obviously.)
author: @VividhKothari-rd5ll
